Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: just got it, no problems until now and the product is really good.  The only little problem is that it doesn't come with an English manual.

Reviews.Title: S3 MINI that means not a full size S3
Reviews.Author: Jerry Adams
Reviews.Content: Thought I ordered an S3. What a surprise!  Works like S3. Fast like S3. Just smaller. I like it enough to keep.  So if you want S3 functionality in smaller form factor then this is it. Love Android OS.

Reviews.Title: Samsung GT-i8190 Galaxy S3 Mini White factory Unlocked 3G 900/1900/2100
Reviews.Author: T.Karthik
Reviews.Content: This mobile was just about ok for my needs. Battery is not that good. Sometimes screen freezes also. . .

Reviews.Title: PERFECT PHONE
Reviews.Author: Alfredo
Reviews.Content: The phone is just perfect, It was a gift for my wife and she loved it. Perfecta size, complete unlock, just what I was looking for, I really recommend this phone

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: Richard Garner
Reviews.Content: It has only been a few days but the phone is working great.  The only issue we have is the instructions are in Spanish and we do not read or speak Spanish.  The phone itself was also set for Spanish but got changed over when we activated the phone with the carrier.  May change rating depending on performance in the future.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted!!
Reviews.Author: Sheri
Reviews.Content: This phone is exactly what I wanted!!  It has almost all the capabilities of it's larger sibling, but so much smaller and more convenient!  I have had no issues with this phone since I've owned it (almost 3 months now).  The screen is bright, the size is perfect, and it runs like a top.  I had a question before I bought it, but no one seemed to be able to answer me, so I will add this to my post.  Although it is from overseas, it WILL work in America.  The charger I received was not an American plug, but the company I ordered it from included the adapter.  Make sure you check with the company you order it from to make sure they are including the adapter.  The only thing I saw that was inconvenient was that they weather app that comes standard, only seemed to want to show Celsius temperatures.  I couldn't figure out how to change it so I just downloaded a different app.  No worries!!  Great phone, great size, great experience so far!!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Sandraliz
Reviews.Content: Nice good sice and excellent performance in Venezuelawith my data plan. Too fast and easy to use. nice aplicatication to yield good battery

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: Bernd Saggau
Reviews.Content: It has a good size and all features my daughter needs - it was easy to set up - great product

Reviews.Title: The network is better than 3G
Reviews.Author: Likif Diaz
Reviews.Content: The network is better than 3G is HSDPA 14.4 Mbps, depending on the data packet ofresce your carrier.  I love

Reviews.Title: Great phone from a great company.
Reviews.Author: Angel Castillo
Reviews.Content: What can I say that people don't already know about the Galaxy S II mini? It's a great phone from a great company.

Reviews.Title: good one
Reviews.Author: coco
Reviews.Content: A good phoneBuy it if you need one like this,I am in Africa and this one  works fine.i installed many applications and they work well.

Reviews.Title: Some minor issues with software
Reviews.Author: Dshabs
Reviews.Content: I believe this unit is a "knock off" and not an original Samsung device.  The give away is my wife attempting to install Facebook app and receiving an error message "App not available in your country" or something to that effect. Otherwise, the phone performs well enough.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: fer
Reviews.Content: Good time of this item. I do not have any problem with the purchases and  the quality it is good.

Reviews.Title: Loaded & Pretty
Reviews.Author: Mira B.
Reviews.Content: Received it late yesterday I  just now open the box the phone looks pretty and has a lot of functions its too early to say since I just start navigating around it. I love it so far the only set back is the phone doesn't come with a manual in English. Can anyone who has is or the seller tell me what to do here.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Berenice ferrero "berian_4ever"
Reviews.Content: Its a great phone. Much better than any blackberry. Slim, cute, fast... recommended in white for girls, in black for guys

Reviews.Title: Great phone, handy
Reviews.Author: Ketan Vaidya
Reviews.Content: Great phone, very happy with the purchase. Fast download speeds, voice quality and features are good. Nicely made and very handy compared to the S3/S4.

Reviews.Title: in lovvvvvveeeee
Reviews.Author: Cayman Mariposa
Reviews.Content: Love everything about this phone except the fact the battery dies quite quickly.. then again, I am on it ALOT! I have looked for battery saving apps, haven't found one that's not given a rocket science explanation on how to work it...any recommendations welcome :)I have small hands so it feels perfect! Tried to hold an S4 and I felt like a caveman trying to build a wheel. Waaay too big and awkward for me. The S3 Mini is a perfect fit!Will be travelling with it to Australia so I hope to god it works over there.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Maria Belen Barreto
Reviews.Content: very easy to use, technology standars high, very fast and high image quality. i had a samsung galaxy pro before.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Nataliya
Reviews.Content: I love this phone a lot!!!! It is perfect size, nice design and does what I need.  Love it, love it, love it and very happy I got it!!

Reviews.Title: Very cool Phone
Reviews.Author: Hayk
Reviews.Content: Worth the money, very light, tiny.I bought it for my wife and she is very satisfied with this phome
